ModMetaData.name: [1.0] Witch's Garden
ModMetaData.author: FantasyFan
ModMetaData.description:
Have you ever wanted to grow a witch garden with many herbs and flowers. Now you can.
This mod adds 19 different plants: -Rosmary -Basil -Lavender -Yarrow -Hellebores -Comfrey -Peppermint (can only be grown in flower pots or hydroponics) -Thyme -Calendula -Mint (can only be grown in flower pots or hydroponics) -Chamomile -Sage -Lemon Balm -Nettle -Mugwort -Chives -Parsley -Lilacs (decorative) -Dianthus (decorative)
One new workbench: -Composter (compost Compost starter (veggies at butcher table) to Compost for better fertility flooring)
Five research projects
Seven herb teas and one fine meal with herbs
Two new floors: -Mulch (120% Fertility - turn wood into bark at crafting spot) -Compost (135% Fertility)
Can be added to existing saves.
If you find things unbalanced, please make suggestions for improvement.
